ygData.subject: What have people seen change with the patch?
ygData.msgSnippet: Apparently there s been a lot of unannounced changes with the last patch. Just wondering what new things people have seen/noticed.  I m not looking to hear
ygData.messageBody:
Apparently there's been a lot of unannounced changes with the last patch.
Just wondering what new things people have seen/noticed. I'm not looking to
hear complaints about this being nerfed and that being ruined. Just
wondering what funky new stuff people have seen like Shadow Men, mushrooms
and cabbages. Also any changes that we, as bards should watch out for.


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 39 Bard
Erollisi Marr
